mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTYPE, FLAG, PAYDATE, MOBILE, GROUPID, SMSFLAG, FILEURL, STATE, UPLOADTIME, RECORDNUM, SUCCESSNUM, ERRORNUM, SUCCESSURL, ERRORURL, PROCESSTIME, CORPID, SOURCETYPE, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, FILETYPE, DESCR, SHOPITEMID from DB_UPLOADFILE where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
